properties.description: Advertising services company founded in 2014 and headquartered in Saudi Arabia; 79 employees with +37.3% YoY growth; seed funding received in 2016; specializes in advertising, creative concepts, brand activation, communication strategy, and SEO services; active in digital marketing with a global rank of #2,152,633 and 2,696 monthly visits.
properties.content:
![the logo for habbar creative house](https://www.habbar.com/format)
اللي مايعرف الحبّار يقليه
.. جاري تحبير الموقع
←اطلع على أعمالنا من هنا
[أعمال الحبّار](http://ads.habbar.com)
← فيك حبّار؟ قدّم
[قدّم](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe0gzpvE3NKPQrXVLj6ORgcycujGPqid-CAXXaKQO4TgMDXZg/viewform)
[Twitter icon](https://twitter.com/@habbaring)
[Instagram icon](https://instagram.com/habbaring)
[WhatsApp icon](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=966594687538)

company.name: Habbar
company.about:
ننتمي لذوات الأمخاخ المرتفعة، طائفة الفكريات، فصيلة الحبريات. ملاقيف، أي شيء يشتتنا والأشياء الغريبة تجذبنا. نعيش في بحر الأفكار، ونروح وين ما ياخذنا الحبّار.

A bit of ink can make everything link.

A thinking creature that feeds on inspiration as it dwells among quills. Spends its time morphing letters into ideas and sometimes a picture or a tale.

Contact us today to learn more: HalaWalla@habbar.com

evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile lists Habbar’s workforce as 79 employees, which falls within the 51–200 employee range specified by the criterion.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SEO industry and is headquartered or has a significant presence in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)
evaluations.reasoning: Habbar’s internal profile confirms it is headquartered in Saudi Arabia, satisfying the geographic requirement. External references show the company offers SEO services – RocketReach lists “Seo” among its service categories, and a review site describes Habbar as a digital‑marketing agency that specializes in high‑quality SEO. These sources collectively demonstrate that Habbar operates in the SEO industry and has a significant presence in KSA.
